EmailTemplate.subject: Selective Licence Drafted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.Salutation} {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.FirstName} {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.LastName},
Further to your application for selective licensing of {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence_Record_Type__c} application, we now have pleasure in enclosing the draft licence with proposed licence conditions.
The legislation states that all licences and conditions are issued in draft and are subject to a 28 day consultation period.
If you wish to make representations, please do so within the above timescale by sending them to (email address). Any representations made after the consultation period will not be considered.
If no representations are received the licence will be issued upon expiry of the consultation period.
Yours Sincerely, Housing Enforcement Team Peterborough City Council
